description:
'euca-describe-availability-zones verbose' puts all nodes in the nova zone, and does not support any other availability zones.

 'euca-describe-availability-zones verbose' runs nova/api/ec2/cloud.py:_describe_availability_zones_verbose() which has the ZoneName nova hard coded
title: euca-describe-availability-zones verbose only supports nova zone
